把我的答案设为最佳就行啦

replies.author: pokemongh
replies.txt_content:
点击“options”边上的气球设置语言，参考
http://tieba.baidu.com/p/2735714718

replies.author: pokemongh
replies.txt_content: 要是语言选项没有，就多开几次游戏加载出来
